Product Title: Disposable Shower Cap, Elastic Bath Cap,Waterproof Hair Head Cover Shower Cap For Home Use,Hotel and Beauty Salon,Pack of 120 （Blue)
Review Date: 2020/08/17
Store: KarlunKoy
Average Rating: 3.2
Product Details: {'Brand': 'KarlunKoy', 'Material': 'Ethylene Vinyl Acetate (EVA)', 'Pattern': 'Solid', 'Number of Items': '120', 'Inner Material': 'EVA', 'Package Dimensions': '8.14 x 7.2 x 3.34 inches; 4.8 Ounces', 'UPC': '714573871218'}
Review Text: I was super excited to receive this bag, unfortunately they are not big enough to hold my long hair. Nice material and color.
Review Title: Not for long hair.
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: 3D Mask Bracket - Internal Support Holder Frame Nose Breathing Smoothly- Lipstick Protection Cool Mask Bracket - DIY Face Mask Accessories - 5Pcs (L-Adult)
Review Date: 2020/09/13
Store: Vedory
Product Description: ['❤-Outfits Set Include: 1 pack of 5 3D mask bracket (not including mask or cloth, etc.). ❤-Size: about 10*9*4.2cm / 3.9*3.51*1.64 inches, enough space for various masks. ❤-Unique design: designed to fit the face of the nose bridge, breathing more smoothly, breathable and not stuffy. ❤-Ideal Saver for Makeup - It makes the mask not to stick lipstick, protecting your perfect makeup from being messed up.If you wear glasses, 3D Inner Bracket can also prevent the lens from fogging because of more breathing space. ❤ 3D Inner Bracket also suitable for various ma-sks.Using double sided tape or thread to fasten the silicone frame onto the mask can make it work better.']
Average Rating: 3.5
Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '6.3 x 4.72 x 2.36 inches; 1.41 Ounces', 'UPC': '800914455053', 'Manufacturer': 'Vedory'}
Review Text: This one was a dud for me. Although the bracket did stay in place it made me look like an anteater. It only would work with certain masks. The plastic was hard, but looks like it would be easy to clean. I used a couple times, but have just gone back to not wearing anything.
Review Title: Skip this face mask bracket
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Nail Files 16 Pcs, Double Sided Emery Board Manicure Tools for Filing Natural Gel and Acrylic Nails for Home and Salon Use
Review Date: 2020/09/20
Store: Keiby Citom
Average Rating: 4.3
Product Details: {'Material': 'Acrylic', 'Brand': 'Keiby Citom', 'Grit Number': '100', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '7.8 x 5.08 x 0.59 inches; 5.29 Ounces', 'UPC': '742025065137', 'Manufacturer': 'YHIT'}
Review Text: Thick nail files. Very high end quality. Got plenty for the price. Work as expected, even better.
Review Title: Great quality nail file
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Hemp Lotion for Dry Skin - Soothing Rose Flower & Aloe Hydrate Your Complexion - Non-Greasy, Vegan, 7Oz, 250Mg Hemp, Fragrance & Paraben Free - Guayaquil By La La Leaf
Review Date: 2020/10/04
Store: LA LA LEAF
Average Rating: 4.1
Product Details: {'Brand': 'LA LA LEAF', 'Item Form': 'Lotion', 'Unit Count': '7.00 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Use for': 'Whole Body', 'Package Dimensions': '8.19 x 2.28 x 2.17 inches; 8.78 Ounces', 'UPC': '860002750125'}
Review Text: Amazing lotion, probably one of the best I have used.  My skin stays glowing after forever. There is no scent which is nice. Pretty packaging.
Review Title: Amazing lotion
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: 1513 by LA LA LEAF - All Natural Facial Cream, 750mg Quick Absorbing Hemp Moisturizer with Rosehip, Carrot Seed and Provitamin B5 - Smooths Wrinkles for Firm Glowing Skin - Paraben-free, Cruelty-free, Vegan
Review Date: 2020/10/13
Store: LA LA LEAF
Average Rating: 4.0
Product Details: {'Brand': 'LA LA LEAF', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Use for': 'Whole Body', 'Package Dimensions': '7.1 x 3.2 x 2 inches; 2.4 Ounces'}
Review Text: This cream will leave your skin glowing! I have always had an issue with oily skin and this cream made it oily x 10.  My skin did not feel softer, just oily.  There is no scent which i appreciate.  The black and white packaging is pretty.
Review Title: Be prepared for oily skin!
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Wiwoseo Faux Mink Lashes False Eyelashes Dramatic 20MM Long Wispy Cat Eyes Look Lashes 20 Pairs Mixed 2 Styles Fake Eye Lashes Wholesale Pack
Review Date: 2020/10/13
Store: wiwoseo
Average Rating: 4.4
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Wiwoseo', 'Material': 'Faux Mink, Cotton', 'Material Feature': 'Cruelty Free', 'Item Form': 'Pair', 'Mounting Type': 'Eyelash Glue', 'Package Dimensions': '9 x 7.6 x 0.7 inches; 1.59 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'F1507-5'}
Review Text: Great dramatic lashes.  For me I had to cut to fit my eye, but it was was easy.  They stayed on all night when I went out and they feel very soft. I got several uses out of one pair, which is always nice.  Big package so no need to clean just throw out once you are done and grab a new pair.
Review Title: pretty dramatic lashes for going out!
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Lnlofen 2Pcs Hollow Woven Headband with Clips, Fashion Braided Headbands Double Layer Twist Plait Headband Hair Tools, Double Bangs Hairstyle Hairpin for Women Girls (Brown & Black)
Review Date: 2020/11/30
Store: Lnlofen
Average Rating: 3.5
Product Details: {'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Material': 'Resin', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Brand': 'Lnlofen', 'Size': '2 Count (Pack of 1)', 'Package Dimensions': '11.69 x 7.83 x 0.59 inches; 1.34 Ounces', 'UPC': '768894803793'}
Review Text: I haven't worn a headband in years. These are soft and easy to wear, they dont hurt your head. Cute, unique design.
Review Title: Fun unique design
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: KISSIO Lipstick Set,4Pcs Cigarette Matte Lipstick Set,Red Matte Pigmentation Lipstick,Long Lasting Waterproof Lipstick for women
Review Date: 2020/12/06
Store: KISSIO
Average Rating: 4.3
Product Details: {'Brand': 'KISSIO', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Item Form': 'Stick', 'Finish Type': 'Matte', 'Product Benefits': 'Long Lasting,Cleansing,Moisturizing,Long-lasting,Makeup', 'Package Dimensions': '10.79 x 8.27 x 0.47 inches; 2.01 Ounces'}
Review Text: I was very disappointed in the color of these lipsticks. One was very orange the other one was very pink. They were not matte they were hard to work with. The texture was very soft and messy.
Review Title: If you are looking for matte fall colors skip these
Rating: 1.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Galashy Magnetic Eyelashes With Eyeliner Kit - 5 Pairs Reusable False Lashes, 2 Bottles Magnetic Liner, Tweezer Applicator Tool
Review Date: 2021/01/31
Store: GALASHY
Average Rating: 3.6
Product Details: {'Brand': 'GALASHY', 'Material': 'Cotton', 'Material Feature': 'Gluten Free', 'Item Form': 'Pair', 'Mounting Type': 'Eyelash Glue', 'Package Dimensions': '5.71 x 5.35 x 0.75 inches; 2.08 Ounces', 'Item model number': '1', 'UPC': '860004689263'}
Review Text: The lashes themselves are good quality but it’s hard to trim them to fit your own eyeshape. You need to put 2 layers of the eyeliner on your eyelid and it’s very hard to get off when you’re done. It’s sticky and can irritate your eyes.
Review Title: Hard to remove
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: MYFOOT Moisturizing Foot Wipe for After Foot Mask Peel or After Beach, Fresh Cleansing Wet Wipes Helps to Soothe Dry Heels, Repair and Hydrate Healthy Feet with Vitamin E & Aloe
Review Date: 2021/03/02
Store: MYFOOT
Average Rating: 3.6
Product Details: {'Brand': 'MYFOOT', 'Product Benefits': 'Moisturizing', 'Scent': 'Fresh', 'Skin Type': 'Dry,Sensitive', 'Unit Count': '2.00 Count'}
Review Text: Nice product.  Easy to use. They come in a wrapper, not too wet.  No strong scent. I used them after work and they were okay.  Did not clean my feet or make them soft. Just a  wipe down and a little more clean feel.
Review Title: okay feet wipes
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------

        [Your overall summary here]
raw_response:
POSITIVE SUMMARY:
The user experienced a range of positive interactions with various products. They appreciated the high quality and effectiveness of nail care items, noting great quality and durability. The skincare products were also favored, with users highlighting excellent moisturizing properties and pleasant packaging aesthetics. Fashion accessories, such as the headbands, received praise for their comfort, unique design, and ease of use. Additionally, the bubblegum lip gloss kit was valued for its appealing scent and effective moisturizing capabilities, contributing to a gratifying purchase experience overall.

NEGATIVE SUMMARY:
The user encountered several negative experiences with certain purchases. Challenges were noted with hair accessories, which were too loose for thicker hair types. Additionally, makeup products like the eyebrow pencil and brow stamp were criticized for their difficulty of application and quality issues, including arriving in poor condition. Users expressed disappointment with a lipstick set that did not match expected colors or finish. The face mask bracket was also deemed unattractive and impractical, reflecting a trend of dissatisfaction with particular beauty and grooming products.

OVERALL SUMMARY:
Overall, the user's shopping experience was a mix of satisfaction and frustration. They enjoyed high-quality products in nail care and skincare categories, which indicated positive engagement with beauty items promoting self-care. However, several beauty and fashion products did not meet expectations, leading to negative reviews centered around practicality and usability. While the user found fantastic options that enhanced their routine, they also faced challenges with less effective items, highlighting the variability in product performance and suitability.

target_interaction.title: Pretty
target_interaction.text: Super cute look just like the picture, hold up for about a week for me, I wash my hands a lot! Great quality and look, very stylish. Great price would recommend!
